confirmation.logout.title: Are you sure you want to Logout?
confirmation.logout.description: Please confirm if you wish to proceed with logging out. You will lose your current session and be redirected to the login page upon successful logout.
validation.failed.form.title: Form Submission Error
validation.failed.form.description: Please review your entries. Ensure all required fields are filled correctly
validation.failed.email: Please enter a valid email address
error.request.title: Form Request Error
error.request.description: An unknown error was returned by the server. Please try again.
error.logout.title: Logout Unsuccessful
error.logout.description: An issue occurred during the logout process. Please attempt to logout again.
error.login.title: Login Unsuccessful
error.login.description: Your login credentials could not be verified. Please verify your details and try again.
page.error.unknown.title: Unexpected Error Occurred
page.error.unknown.description: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
page.error.notFound.title: Page Not Found
page.error.notFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn’t exist or has been moved. Please check the URL.
page.error.unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
page.error.unauthorized.description: You do not have permission to view this page. Please log in with the appropriate credentials or contact your administrator.
page.error.forbidden.title: Access Forbidden
page.error.forbidden.description: You do not have the necessary permissions to access this resource. If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator.
page.error.fatal.title: Critical Error
page.error.fatal.description: A critical error has occurred, preventing the application from functioning correctly. Please refresh the page or contact technical support.
